title: Does Germany today have a Nationalist Party? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, several. Only one of them with significant vote counts. The AfD. There were other attempts in the past decades (NPD, DVU, Republikaner) all of them having some “success” for a few years, becoming unimportant fast after proving their inability to change things. A honorable mentioning should be reserved for the CSU, which is more of a regionalist-populist party (Bavaria first) but can be rather nationalistic when it suits their agenda.
